ing: 1/3 cup black Greek olives, pitted and sliced
n: Ziti With Olives and Sun-Dried Tomatoes
des: "I always use ziti to make this, it looks so elegant, but any macaroni will do. Serve with a Greek salad."
ins:
Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Meanwhile, place sun-dried tomatoes, olives, parsley, olive oil, anchovy fillets, and garlic in a large serving bowl.
Drain pasta. Transfer to serving bowl, and toss with the sauce.  Serve.
